name: holenav
description: New mapper for make benefit of the glorious EVE community. Currently in early prototyping.

scripts.db:seed: docker exec -i holenav-db sh -c 'mongoimport -c systems -d holenav --jsonArray' < data/staticData/systems.json
scripts.db:dump: docker exec -i holenav-db mongoexport -c systems -d holenav > db_dump.json
